description: Core experiments for the Climate Model Intercomparison Project.  CMIP includes the DECK (Diagnosis, Evaluation, and Characterization of Klima (Climate)) experiments:  1pctCO2, abrupt-4xCO2, amip, piControl and esm-piControl. CMIP also includes the historical experiments: historical, esm-hist, historical-ext, esm-hist-ext.
keywords: climate sensitivity, historical reference, control simulations, unforced variability, DECK
label: CMIP
rationale: To maintain continuity and help document basic characteristics of models across different phases of CMIP.
